name: Quasar Escape
description:
Directions: [SPACE] or [Mouse Click] will launch the Rocket Ship. 

Aim for the orbit of the planet (represented by a dotted white line) , not the planet itself. 

Keep going to get the highest score and go quick enough to avoid the Black Hole racing towards you.

Quasar Escape is an Endless Runner with a twist. 

You play as a Rocket Ship escaping a Black Hole by hopping planet to planet. 

Our team wanted to create an Endless Runner that was unique and we decided with an orbital approach.

Developed By:

Danny Baghdasarians

Thomas Price

Jacqueline Castro

Quinn Satow
